scenario_text.value:
What about this mural? What was it supposed
to mean again?

Uh... I think it was a depiction of some
monster rampaging through our world.
Isn’t that what you said, Professor?

I believe the legends of various monsters
around the world are based on Kemonogami.

This is of course only a theory, but that is
my contention.

I believe humans were awed by the Kemonogami,
who could bring either disaster...

...or great fortune, and that in time these
feelings gave rise to a kind of faith.

You know, not to change the subject, but
after spending time here, I can see it.

Indeed. Perhaps it is people’s faith that has
shaped this world into its current form.

The state of the world...the mind shapes
it... So the monsters and this world both...

No, I still don’t have enough information.
Let’s keep going.

I feel I am approaching a breakthrough...
although I can’t say anything yet.
